history.proof: intros V T H H0 f g H1 t l. qsimpl time: 1 use: Traverse. destruct H. sauto q: on depth: 3use: Traverse, traverse_relative.

ctx: intros V T H H0 f g H1 t l.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce Traverse to an evaluable reference.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T), TraverseRelative -> forall f g : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = g l x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = traverse g l t

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Record Traverse (V T : Type) : Type := Build_Traverse { traverse : (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T } Arguments Traverse (_ _)%type_scope Arguments Build_Traverse [V T]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record TraverseRelative (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseRelative { traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t } Arguments TraverseRelative {V T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_TraverseRelative [V T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
traverse = fun (V T : Type) (Traverse0 : Traverse V T) => let (traverse) := Traverse0 in traverse : forall V T : Type, Traverse V T -> (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T Arguments traverse {V T}%type_scope {Traverse} _%function_scope _%nat_scope
Build_TraverseRelative : forall (V T : Type) (H : Traverse V T), (forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (p : nat) (t : T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t) -> TraverseRelative
Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall f : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t) -> TraverseVarIsIdentity
Build_TraverseFunctorial : forall (V : Type) (H : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (t : T) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t) -> TraverseFunctorial
Record TraverseVarIsIdentity (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity { traverse_var_is_identity : forall f : nat -> nat -> V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t } Arguments TraverseVarIsIdentity {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseVarIsIdentity [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record TraverseFunctorial (V : Type) (H : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseFunctorial { traverse_functorial : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> V) (t : T) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t } Arguments TraverseFunctorial {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseFunctorial [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
traverse_relative : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> ?V) (p : nat) (t : ?T) (m l : nat), (forall l0 x : nat, f (l0 + p) x = g l0 x) -> m = l + p -> traverse f m t = traverse g l t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Traverse ?V ?T] ?TraverseRelative : [ |- TraverseRelative]
Build_TraverseIdentifiesVar : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), (forall (f : nat -> nat -> V) (l x : nat), traverse f l (var x) = f l x) -> TraverseIdentifiesVar
Build_TraverseVarInjective : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T), (forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (t1 t2 : T) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t1 = traverse_var f l t2 -> t1 = t2) -> TraverseVarInjective
traverse_functorial : forall (f g : nat -> nat -> ?V) (t : ?T) (l : nat), traverse g l (traverse f l t) = traverse (fun l0 x : nat => traverse g l0 (f l0 x)) l t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Traverse ?V ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Traverse ?V ?T] ?TraverseFunctorial : [ |- TraverseFunctorial]
traverse_var_is_identity : forall f : nat -> nat -> ?V, (forall l x : nat, f l x = var x) -> forall (t : ?T) (l : nat), traverse f l t = t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Traverse ?V ?T] ?TraverseVarIsIdentity : [ |- TraverseVarIsIdentity]
Record TraverseVarInjective (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) : Prop := Build_TraverseVarInjective { traverse_var_injective : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (t1 t2 : T) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t1 = traverse_var f l t2 -> t1 = t2 } Arguments TraverseVarInjective {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_TraverseVarInjective [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record TraverseIdentifiesVar (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) : Prop := Build_TraverseIdentifiesVar { traverse_identifies_var : forall (f : nat -> nat -> V) (l x : nat), traverse f l (var x) = f l x } Arguments TraverseIdentifiesVar {V}%type_scope {H H0} Arguments Build_TraverseIdentifiesVar [V]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
traverse_identifies_var : forall (f : nat -> nat -> ?V) (l x : nat), traverse f l (var x) = f l x where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?H0 : [ |- Traverse ?V ?V] ?TraverseIdentifiesVar : [ |- TraverseIdentifiesVar]
traverse_var_injective : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (t1 t2 : ?T) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t1 = traverse_var f l t2 -> t1 = t2 where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Traverse ?V ?T] ?TraverseVarInjective : [ |- TraverseVarInjective]
List.NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ List.In x l -> List.NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, List.NoDup l -> P l
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
List.count_occ_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (decA : forall x1 x2 : A, {x1 = x2} + {x1 <> x2}) (decB : forall y1 y2 : B, {y1 = y2} + {y1 <> y2}), (forall x1 x2 : A, f x1 = f x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (x : A) (l : list A), List.count_occ decA l x = List.count_occ decB (List.map f l) (f x)
List.NoDup_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall i j : nat, i < length l -> j < length l -> List.nth i l d = List.nth j l d -> i = j)
List.In_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x d : A), List.In x l -> exists n : nat, n < length l /\ List.nth n l d = x
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
List.NoDup_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), ~ List.In x l -> List.NoDup l -> List.NoDup (x :: l)
Build_Traverse : forall V T : Type, ((nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T) -> Traverse V T
List.count_occ_inv_nil : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), (forall x : A, List.count_occ eq_dec l x = 0) < -> l = nil
f_equal2_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> nat -> B) (x1 y1 x2 y2 : nat), x1 = y1 -> x2 = y2 -> f x1 x2 = f y1 y2
List.nth_In : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> List.In (List.nth n l d) l
Nat.max_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, n < m /\ f n m = m \/ m <= n /\ f n m = n) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.max n m
Nat.min_unicity_ext : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, (forall n m : nat, n < m /\ f n m = n \/ m <= n /\ f n m = m) -> forall n m : nat, f n m = Nat.min n m
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : List.NoDup nil | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ List.In x l -> List.NoDup l -> List.NoDup (x :: l) Arguments List.NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments List.NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments List.NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Fin.t_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
lift = fun (T : Type) (Lift0 : Lift T) => let (lift) := Lift0 in lift : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> nat -> T -> T Arguments lift {T}%type_scope {Lift} (_ _)%nat_scope
natr_ring_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lH : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N * Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N)) (l : list nat), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) eq BinNat.N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l lH ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) BinNat.N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) BinNums.N0 (BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH) BinNat.N.eqb BinNat.N.to_nat (get_sign_None (C:=BinNums.N)) l npe
Build_LiftInjective : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2) -> LiftInjective
var = fun (V : Type) (Var0 : Var V) => let (var) := Var0 in var : forall V : Type, Var V -> nat -> V Arguments var {V}%type_scope {Var} _%nat_scope
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
List.count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.eq_stepl : forall x y z : nat, x = y -> x = z -> z = y
Ring_polynom.ring_rw_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l pe) (Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp cO cI ceqb phi get_sign l npe)
f_equal_pred : forall x y : nat, x = y -> Init.Nat.pred x = Init.Nat.pred y

```coq
intros V T H H0 f g H1 t l. unfold Traverse in H. destruct H. apply traverse_relative with (l := l) (m := l) (p := 0) (t := t); try omega.
  - intros. apply H1.
  - reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros V T H H0 f g H1 t l. unfold Traverse in H. destruct H. apply traverse_relative with (l := l) (m := l) (p := 0) (t := t); try omega. - intros. apply H1. - reflexivity.
